EmailTemplate.description: Notifies RS partner that funds have been disbursed
EmailTemplate.name: RS Partner - 10% Disbursal
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Opportunity.Name}'s Solar Loan funds have been disbursed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|MC:SUBJECT|*
Dear {!Opportunity.Partner_tag_lookup__c},
BlueWave has disbursed {!Opportunity.Disbursal_3_Full_Install__c} to {!Opportunity.Partner_tag2__c} for {!Opportunity.Name}'s Solar Loan. Please contact a member of our Customer Care team if you do not receive these funds within 5 business days.
BlueWave Customer Care customercare@bluewavesolar.com (844) 786 - 4100
